ygData.subject: Re: EQ Report
ygData.msgSnippet: Uh... yeah, what JS and Boggs said too. (I just saw your posts, guys-- good advice). P.S.-- Remember to imagine your audience in thier underwear,
ygData.messageBody:
Uh... yeah, what JS and Boggs said too. (I just
saw your posts, guys-- good advice). <br><br>P.S.--
Remember to imagine your audience in thier underwear,
(until your audience is over 18, then you can imagine
them naked). This never works for me, though, as I get
too distracted to go forward with the
presentation.<br><br>P.P.S.-- If you prepared written materials, please post
them on this board. If you do it early enough, i'm
sure you'll get some helpful (hopefully)
reviews/suggestions and tons of support, that will help you with
editing the work. (Life is much like EQ-- if you're first
effort is not your best, don't give up. That first
careless lighting only did 34dmg? Hmmm... Hit the mob
again, or maybe take a different approach with a DOT and
some melee). <br><br>Xela
